homeSubtitle:
I am from Saudi Arabia and I live in NYC. I work in tech as full stack  developer and I love it :).

Outside  of  work, I read a bunch, and I like being in the mountains.

Also, I love learning new languages, I know a handful (maybe 2?) of them but not so well.
